description: Rafah's Kuwait Hospital was overwhelmed after people were injured by an airstrike on a building close-by.
maintext:
The Kuwait Hospital in Rafah, southern Gaza was overwhelmed by casualties after an Israeli air strike on a nearby building that was reportedly housing displaced civilians.
At least 20 people are said to have been killed and dozens injured, according to Gaza's health ministry.
The injured were rushed to the hospital in ambulances and carried in blankets by civilians.
There has been no immediate comment from the Israel Defense Forces.
title: Gaza: Rafah hospital in chaos after nearby Israeli air strike
